blogPost.excerpt: Boostcamp is a free fitness education app for beginners of all levels. We partner with world-class coaches to create workout programs (at-home, gym, cardio) that are progression-based and customizable. Join Boostcamp to learn how to train, not just exercise.
blogPost.body: Boostcamp is a free fitness education app for beginners of all levels. We partner with world-class coaches to create workout programs (at-home, gym, cardio) that are progression-based and customizable. Join Boostcamp to learn how to train, not just exercise.
blogPost.title: Boostcamp - Free fitness education app for beginners
blogPost.author: Pavlo Pedenko

localize.description: Boostcamp是一款免费的健身教育应用，适合各种水平的初学者。我们与世界一流的教练合作，创建锻炼计划（在家、健身房、有氧运动），这些计划是基于进展和可定制的。加入Boostcamp，学习如何训练，而不仅仅是锻炼。
localize.tagline: 初学者的免费健身教育应用

localize.description: Boostcamp是一款免費的健身教育應用，適合各種水平的初學者。我們與世界一流的教練合作，創建鍛鍊計劃（在家、健身房、有氧運動），這些計劃是基於進展和可定製的。加入Boostcamp，學習如何訓練，而不僅僅是鍛鍊。
localize.tagline: 初學者的免費健身教育應用

previous.excerpt: Share and sell your next ebook, guide, or essays as a beautiful premium space. You can publish content, get feedback from your readers, and get paid in a few clicks.
previous.title: Lumenful - Create beautiful premium spaces for your best ideas

localize.description: 分享和销售你的下一本电子书，指南或论文作为一个美丽的高级空间。您可以发布内容，获得读者的反馈，并在点击几下后获得报酬。
localize.tagline: 为您的最佳创意创造美丽的高级空间

localize.description: 分享和銷售你的下一本電子書，指南或論文作爲一個美麗的高級空間。您可以發佈內容，獲得讀者的反饋，並在點擊幾下後獲得報酬。
localize.tagline: 爲您的最佳創意創造美麗的高級空間

next.excerpt: 100% of your meals show up via delivery service. They perfectly meet your macro and calorie targets. Rank your performance, hunger, and enjoyment and the service gets smarter. Save at least 3.5 hours per week. For most people, it saves 5+ hours per week.
next.title: Clockwork Nutrition - Perfect nutrition. Hot meals delivered. 100% automated.

localize.description: 您的餐点100%通过快递服务出现。它们完美地满足您的宏观和卡路里目标。对您的表现、饥饿感和享受进行排名，服务会变得更加智能。每周至少节省3.5小时。对于大多数人来说，每周可以节省5个小时以上。
localize.tagline: 完美的营养。热腾腾的饭菜送来。100%自动化。

localize.description: 您的餐點100%通過快遞服務出現。它們完美地滿足您的宏觀和卡路里目標。對您的表現、飢餓感和享受進行排名，服務會變得更加智能。每週至少節省3.5小時。對於大多數人來說，每週可以節省5個小時以上。
localize.tagline: 完美的營養。熱騰騰的飯菜送來。100%自動化。
